resources.string: Onosendai is not currently configured. \n This will help you get started by generating an initial configuration for you that you can customise. Please keep in mind that this is still an ALPHA product and configuration is mostly a manual process. \n Select an action from the list below.

This will import your existing layout from SuccessWhale (SW). For this to you work you must have a SW account with a password configured. \n If you do not have an SW username and password please now go and create one.

This is an advanced option and requires you to manage a JSON file. \n This will generate you a template configuration file for you to fill in. Once this file has been created you must go and edit it and then return to this screen. \n The config file will be written to: ${template_path}

It looks like you have created a template file. \n Use this option to validate that template file and make it active. This will rename the template file. \n The config file: ${template_path} Will be renamed to: ${config_path}
